headline: Actively seeking Full-time opportunities | MS- Information Technology and Management @ Illinois Tech | Ex-Deloitte | Ex-Tata Consultancy Services | Salesforce | Java | Python
summary:
Experienced, multifaceted, enthusiastic, performance-focused, and results-oriented IT professional with 5 years of industry expertise offering hands-on experience in encompassing requirements analysis, efficient code development and armed with exceptional analytical, interpersonal, problem-solving skills. Adept at providing adequate solutions to arising conflicts; as well as working within fast-paced environments while maintaining optimum results.

Core Competencies:
Salesforce Development | Java Development | Python | Machine Learning | Client Collaboration | Agile Methodologies | Team Management | Cross-functional Collaboration | Learning and Development

Education:
I am currently pursuing a Master of Information Technology and Management degree at the Illinois Institute of Technology.

Professional Experience:
I worked for Deloitte as a Salesforce Developer, being a part of the core product development team for our client Waste Management, I honed my skills in creating innovative eCommerce solutions for the business using Apex, Cloud Craze technologies. I also played a key role in driving the entire end-to-end production deployment process for our project effectively. I have extensive experience working with Agile methodologies and collaborating with various stakeholders.

I worked for Tata Consultancy Services as a Java Developer, being a part of the core development team for our client Humana, I honed my skills in developing the Java applications using  Spring Boot, Microservices, Rest API. I have strong hands-on experience in writing clean, maintainable and testable production code following TDD (Test driven development) with JUnit testing and Integration testing using Mockito framework. I have deployed, managed and continuously delivered multiple services on PCF (Pivotal cloud foundry).

Technical Acumen:
Programming languages: Java | Apex | Python | R | HTML | CSS | JavaScript
Technology: Salesforce | Cloud Craze | Microservices | Azure DevOps | Big Data | Cloud Computing | GIT
Tools: PowerBi | Tableau | Proficient in MS Office suite | Unix | Windows | VMWare | MySQL | MongoDB | Oracle

If you are seeking a dedicated and passionate software developer with exceptional analytical, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills, and driven by a passion for continuous learning and growth, please don't hesitate to contact me through LinkedIn to explore opportunities together. You can also reach me via email at hvempati@hawk.iit.edu. I'm open to new connections and collaborations.

experiences.title: Student Placement Co-ordinator of Corporate Liaison Committee
BigData-Hadoop Data Analyst Intern
experiences.description:
• Hands on experience in installing, configuring and using Apache HADOOP ecosystem components like HDFS, Hadoop Map-Reduce, Hive, Sqoop, Pig, HBase, Flume, Spark. 
• Expertise in writing Hadoop Jobs for analyzing data using Map-Reduce and Pig.
• Worked with Map Reduce programs using Apache Hadoop for working with Big Data. 
• Hands on experience in importing and exporting data using Sqoop from HDFS to Relational Database Systems(RDBMS) and vice-versa.
• Good understanding/knowledge of Hadoop Architecture and various components such as HDFS, Job Tracker, Task Tracker, Name Node, Data Node and Map Reduce concepts. 
• Involved in running Hadoop jobs for processing millions of records of text data.
• Involved in creating Hive tables, and loading and analyzing data using hive queries.
• Extracted files from MySQL and placed in HDFS and processed. 
• Analyzing large data sets by running Hive queries and Pig scripts.
• Involved in loading data from LINUX file system to HDFS.

accomplishment_projects.title: Happiness Prediction Analysis using R Language
accomplishment_projects.description:
I have created an extensive data analytics project utilizing the R programming language, centered around the Kaggle dataset titled 'Happiness Analysis Report of 2021.' The primary objective of this endeavor is to calculate the Happiness Score for the dystopia region. The project is organized into the subsequent modules:

1) Data Preparation
2) Data Cleaning
3) Exploratory Data Analysis
4) Hypothesis Testing
5) Correlation Analysis
6) Simple Linear Regression Model
7) Multiple Linear Regression Model
8) Forward Stepwise Subset Selection Linear Regression Model
9) Backward Stepwise Subset Selection Linear Regression Model
10) Model Evaluation Metrics

accomplishment_projects.title: Insurance Management System using JFrame and Oracle SQL
accomplishment_projects.description:
I developed an Insurance Management System that allows users to purchase multiple policies across various insurance categories, including car, vehicle, and travel, all within a single platform. The frontend of the system is built using JFrame, while the backend relies on Oracle DB.

Key features of this application include:

1) Admin Insights Dashboard: This dashboard provides administrators with real-time insights into trending policy names, the number of users utilizing the application, and the total number of policies sold.
2) User Verification: To ensure security, users must undergo an admin verification process after registration before they can make policy purchases within the application.
3) Bill Generation: Upon purchasing a policy through the application, users receive a downloadable PDF version of their bill.
4) Profile Information Modification: Users have the capability to change their security questions and passwords.

The application involves a variety of database operations, including insertion, updating, deletion, and selection.

accomplishment_projects.title: LightSmart - An IoT based Smart and Efficient Street Light Automation using Cloud
accomplishment_projects.description: Intelligent smart street light system works in such a way that street lights will be automatically controlled (ON/OFF) by the centralized control for example: Android app, so that we can minimize the energy consumption to maximum extent, and the most important part of my project is that the live data of the project i.e: information regarding to light system will be sent to cloud to manage the controlling system more effectively and an android app is used to control the central working of the system. This project is aimed at conserving the energy, and effectively maintaining the street light system in an intelligent way where manual work will be minimized with the advent of automation technology.

accomplishment_projects.title: Multi-Banking Transaction System using ASP.Net - C#
accomplishment_projects.description: Multi-Banking Transaction System is a platform where all banks across the world are integrated into one single platform, where anyone with Bank Account from any BANK across the world can make transactions here and explore the services provided by Multi-Banking Transaction System and its services are highly secured. So, all are invited here to create an account for free and explore our services.

accomplishment_projects.title: Placement Activity System using JAVA
accomplishment_projects.description: This Project is aimed at developing an online placement portal for the Placement department of the University and can be accessed by the organization itself and others as well with proper login credentials provided. This system can be used as an application for the PO (Placement Officer) of the University to manage the student information with regards to placements. Students login can able to upload their information in the form of a CV. Visitors/Company representatives login may also access/search any information put up by Students. Totally, this system is focused on Placement Procedure carried out in any University/College.
